summary:
This mod adds the ability to craft the Dragon Priest Masks at the Forge.

10 Clothing type masks.
10 Light armor type masks.
10 Heavy armor type masks.

Use Forge to craft the masks, look in the DAEDRIC tab.
Masks are crafted Un-enchanted (enchantable)

Masks show correct Armor type in description.
Masks show correct show enchantments.
descriptionHtml:
[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Craftable Dragon Priest Masks v 0.5[/b][/color][/size]
-by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3197165]Zilvereyes[/url]

[url=http://youtu.be/gQ2dqX15ktI]Watch on Youtube[/url]

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size]
This mod adds the ability to craft the Dragon Priest Masks at the Forge.

10 Clothing type masks.
10 Light armor type masks.
10 Heavy armor type masks.

Use Forge to craft the masks, look in the DRAGON tab.
Masks are crafted Un-enchanted (enchantable)

Masks show correct Armor type in description.
Masks correctly shows enchantments.

Clothing type masks are effected by the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Alteration]Alteration[/url] Perk Mage Armor.
Light armor type masks are effected by the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Light_Armor]Light Armor[/url] Perks.
Heavy armor type masks are effected by the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Heavy_Armor]Heavy Armor[/url] Perks.

The Light & Heavy Armor type masks can be Upgraded at the Workbench.
Dragon Armor Smithing perk unlocks (Legendary) Upgrade.

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Version History:[/b][/color][/size]
[05-12-11] 0.1 Release:
Initial release.
[05-12-11] 0.2 Release:
Fixed issue with wrong Armor type listed on item description.
[06-12-11] 0.3 Released:
Moved crafting of masks to the DRAGON tab at the Forge,
(Legendary) Upgrade now require the Dragon Armor smithing perk.
[09-12-11] 0.4 Released:
Now using Localized strings.
Added 10 Clothing masks.
Added Crafting recipes for the Clothing masks.
Overhaul of Crafting & Upgrade recipe for Light & Heavy type masks.
[color=\"#FF0000\"][13-12-11] 0.5 Released:[/color]
Fixed potential loading order issue with localized strings.
Fixed typo in Vokun & Hevnoraak. (internally and visual)
Removed custom naming. (No more \" - Light Mask\", \" - Heavy Mask\" or \" - Clothing Mask\" in the masks names, no need for it they display type in description)
Added French, German, Italian & Spanish localized versions.

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]In Progress:[/b][/color][/size]
Bug testing.
Separated Light, Heavy & Cloth downloads for those that only want one of them.([color=\"#FF0000\"]Moved from Planned[09-12-11][/color])

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Planned:[/b][/color][/size]
Mask armor rating, weight & (sell)value overhaul.([color=\"#FF0000\"]Delayed[09-12-11][/color])
Add requirements to allow crafting of masks. ([color=\"#FF0000\"]New[09-12-11][/color])
Add translated localized version for requested languages. ([color=\"#FF0000\"]New[09-12-11][/color])

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]If you like this mod, you may also like:[/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=799][size=\"4\"]More Craftables[/size][/url] by [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3193983][size=\"1\"]AeonVita[/size][/url]
[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1042][size=\"4\"]JewelCraft[/size][/url] by [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=124708][size=\"1\"]Happy Spike[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=956][size=\"4\"]Craftable Staves[/size][/url] by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3169055][size=\"1\"]Octavvius[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1160][size=\"4\"]Craftable Alcohol[/size][/url] by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2971979][size=\"1\"]CP1172[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1020][size=\"4\"]Lost Art of the Blacksmith[/size][/url] by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3163284][size=\"1\"]Impulseve[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1690][size=\"4\"]Legendary Smithing Upgrades[/size][/url] by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1960021][size=\"1\"]Lucubration[/size][/url]
[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=874][size=\"4\"]Val\'s Crafting Meltdown[/size][/url] by [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1580769][size=\"1\"]Valdosa[/size][/url]

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Requirements:[/b][/color][/size]
Skyrim.

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Compatibility:[/b][/color][/size]
No known issues with any other mods at writing this, though other mods that add the abillity to craft the Dragon Priest Masks will result in doublets.

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Credits:[/b][/color][/size]
Thanks to [url=www.bethsoft.com]Bethesda[/url] for creating [url=www.elderscrolls.com/skyrim]Skyrim[/url]
Thanks to [url=http://www.fallout3nexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=66715]Timeslip[/url] for making [url=http://www.fallout3nexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=640]FOMM[/url] including TESsnip
Thanks to [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/user/742510-samutz]Samutz[/url] for [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1286593-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck]Making New Smithing Recipes (pre-CK)[/url]
Thanks to [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/user/462926-jaysus2]jaysus2[/url] for [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1284257-modding-skyrim-with-tessnip-and-nifskope]Modding Skyrim with TESSnip and Nifskope[/url]
Thanks to [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/user/454424-the-hologram]The Hologram[/url] for [url=https://github.com/figment/tesvsnip]TESsnip modification[/url]

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]
Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\\\steamapps\\\\common\\\\skyrim

To those who are new to using Elder Scrolls mods:

- Do not worry about the Data folder that already exists, the folder provided
by this mod will be merged with the existing folder, it will not be overwritten.

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Uninstallation:[/b][/color][/size]
Remove the following files:

Data/Craftable_DPMasks.esp
Data/Readme/Craftable_DPMasks_Readme.html
Data/Readme/Craftable_DPMasks_Readme.txt
Data/Strings/Craftable_DPMasks_[color=\"#FF0000\"]xxx[/color].DLSTRINGS
Data/Strings/Craftable_DPMasks_[color=\"#FF0000\"]xxx[/color].ILSTRINGS
Data/Strings/Craftable_DPMasks_[color=\"#FF0000\"]xxx[/color].STRINGS

[color=\"#FF0000\"]xxx[/color] = language

[size=\"4\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Distribution Permission:[/b][/color][/size]
- You may use the content for your own mods, permission from me is [u]not[/u] required.
- You may [u]not[/u] redistribute this mod in any way or claim it as your own. 

This is the only exception to the first part of the second rule.
You are allowed to redistribute this mod on a foreign website, [u]only[/u] on the following conditions:

- You will not redistribute here on Nexus
- You will leave the original file structure intact
- You will include the original readme
- You will link back to the original file here at Nexus
- You will notify me and send me a link to the foreign page
- Most importantly: you will have to credit me as the original author
author: Zilvereyes

files.name: Craftable Dragon Priest Masks 0_2
files.changelogHtml: Fixed issue with wrong Armor type listed on item description.

files.name: Craftable Dragon Priest Masks 0_3
files.changelogHtml:
Moved crafting of masks to the DRAGON tab at the Forge.
(Legendary) Upgrade now require the Dragon Armor smithing perk.

files.name: Craftable Dragon Priest Masks 0_4 ENG localized
files.fileName: Craftable Dragon Priest Masks 0_4 ENG localized-2682.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Now using ENG localized strings.
Added 10 Clothing masks.
Added Crafting recipes for the Clothing masks.
Overhaul of Crafting & Upgrade recipe for Light & Heavy type masks.

files.name: Craftable Dragon Priest Masks 0_5 ENG localized
files.fileName: Craftable Dragon Priest Masks 0_5 ENG localized-2682-0-5.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed potential loading order issue with localized strings.
Fixed typo in Vokun & Hevnoraak. (internally and visual)
Removed custom naming. (No more \" - Light Mask\", \" - Heavy Mask\" or \" - Clothing Mask\" in the masks names, no need for it they display type in description)
Added French, German, Italian & Spanish localized versions.
